name: Trails (MonVi)
description:
Leave trails of color in this 2D game!

Use the option of CREATE to draw whatever you'd like with the ability to export your artpiece as a .jpg

Or PLAY against time as you color in a cool smiley

Intructions:

ARROW KEYS to move
SPACE anytime to return to main menu
ESC to quit game

In Create mode:
Click on icons to use, or press corresponding key from keyboard.
Pictures of canvas will be placed into a folder called Screenshots.

In Play mode:
Color in the smiley face the correct color before time runs out!
